name: GobQuest
description:
Description:

Point & Click prototype built in Godot using the Escoria Framework. Get out of cave to finish game.

Credits:

Wyatt Landers: Lead Programmer

Thomas Martin: Artist/Animator/Lead Designer

Scott Buglass: Programmer

Font: Super Mario 256 by fsuarez913: https://www.dafont.com/super-mario-256.font

Controls:

Click: Movement

Investigate: First Button, click this, then click another object to get description. 

Interact: Second Button. click this then click something else to interact with it.

Merge: Third Button, click this, then the two objects in your inventory you want to try and merge.
